content: stars hollow hat was inspired by the gilmore girls tv show this basic hat is perfect to showcase hand dyed yarn twisted rib sts give the hat a polished look the pattern is great for novice knitters as well seasoned knitters keenan hand dyed bulky 106 yds size 10 6 0 mm 16 circulars bor st marker 10 sts markers optional for decreases beanie 16 circumference unstretched x 8 tall to fit an adult head slouch 16 circumference unstretched x 9 tall to fit an adult head
